definition: to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

sentences.english: The loca of continuous models and discrete models are presented and analysed.
sentences.chinese: 并给出连续与离散模型的走势分析。

sentences.english: Through the system tray icon changes color to facilitate the understanding of the market trend.
sentences.chinese: 通过系统托盘上图标颜色变化能够方便了解大盘走势。

sentences.english: You can confirm that 10 points is 1 minute level trend back relaxation.
sentences.chinese: 就可以确认10点是1分钟级别走势的背驰点了。

sentences.english: In the recent rebound in prices, junk stocks is surging.
sentences.chinese: 在近期的反弹行情中，垃圾股走势可谓风起云涌。

sentences.english: Not appeared bearish candlesticks, the trend is still continue.
sentences.chinese: 没有出现阴烛，走势还要继续走。

sentences.english: Domestic wool fine yarn markets decline in trading volume, price trend is stable.
sentences.chinese: 国毛精纺纱市场成交量下降，而品种价格走势呈平稳。

sentences.english: This opens the door for Chinese stocks that benefit from higher levels of inflation to outperform.
sentences.chinese: 这为中国的通胀受益股走出强于大盘走势开启了大门。

sentences.english: We also over-extrapolate the recent past.
sentences.chinese: 我们还过度看重了近期走势。

sentences.english: Forex markets and equities have diverged today.
sentences.chinese: 外汇市场与股市今天走势背离。

sentences.english: However in the securities market of Hong Kong is opposite, the stock trend is independence, and the perfonnance compares dispersion.
sentences.chinese: 而香港证券市场依存度较低，股票走势相对独立。

sentences.english: THE GOVERNMENT has re-emerged as a swing factor for China's volatile stock markets.
sentences.chinese: 政策面再次成为中国股市未来走势的一个重要变数。

sentences.english: We will start with the long-term chart for gold (charts courtesy by http://stockcharts.com.)
sentences.chinese: 我们将从黄金的长期走势图说起。
政策主导国内棉花市场走势。

sentences.english: Corporate card generally is more of a V.
sentences.chinese: 商务卡业务通常是V字型走势。

sentences.english: However, seen from weather development tendency, this rain will not last long.
sentences.chinese: 从天气走势来看，这雨不会停留太久。

sentences.english: Prof. Sylla expects to see stocks turn more lastingly upward some time in the next two years.
sentences.chinese: 塞拉预计两年后股市将回到持续期更长的上行走势中。

definition: market price/quotation of market price/the current market situation
to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
to shake up/to jolt/to vibrate/to oscillate/to fluctuate
stock market index/share price index/abbr. for 股票指數|股票指数[gu3 piao4 zhi3 shu4]
bull market (prices appear to be rising)
Shanghai Stock Exchange (SSE), abbr. for 上海證券交易所|上海证券交易所[Shang4 hai3 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3]
to fall back/to return to low level after a rise (in water level, price etc)
to fall back (of water level or share prices)
